name: Dwarf Miner
description:
This game was developed by a team of two people. It was a project made for our school and this is the final stage of production: Publishing the game.

João Agostinho and João Tomé are the two memebers of the team.

Its a block Breaker game inspired by several classic arcade titles such as: Arkanoid, Breakout, Dx ball etc. Dive in a series of levels full of power-ups to boost your gameplay to another level of fun. Survive and win the game. 

Do you accept this challenge?
